en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Lord Taverner's Charity Hash Run 13th June 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ERNEST FERNANDEZ.

The Lord Taverner's Charity Hash Run was jointly organized with PJ Club Hash House Harriers & Harriets (KPJ Hash) on 13th June 2009, in a charitable mission, where all proceeds go towards helping those less fortunate than us, in a very humane gesture of kindness.

Thanks to the undivided support of the Members of the PJ Club and lead by the indefatigable Y.A.M. Tunku Tan Sri Imran, who is rightfully acclaimed as Malaysia's "Mr. Sport", the mission was to champion the noble cause in helping neglected and underprivileged children around the country.

FusionExcel was one of the major sponsors for this fun filled event where more than 130 Hashers participated, and where 11 Grandmasters from their respective “Hash Chapters”, were presented with our very own Quantum Pendant!

As a token of appreciation, Quantum Pendants were also presented to Y.A.M Tunku Tan Sri Imran by the GM of KPJ Hash, Thiru “Rotweiller”, also the Chairman of the Committee.

GM Deva from Sentosa HHH Chapter, one of the recipients, even commented that he found almost immediate improvement to his knees, and was extremely excited about the “potency” of the Quantum Pendant's Scalar Energy.

Quantum Pendant has done it again!

ON! ON!
